snippet.title: Crusader Kings III - Next-Gen Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Kings and Queens, Lords and Ladies, we have a date! Prepare for conquest on March 29, 2022! Coming soon to Playstation 5 as well as Xbox Series S and X you can experience the thrill of ruling your own Dynasty all from the comfort of your couch. Pre-order Crusader Kings III here: https://www.crusaderkings.com/en/console

Join the Official CK3 Discord - https://discord.gg/ck3

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
